setting.edit_profile_description: You can set preferred display name, create your branded profile URL and manage other personal settings
setting.twitter_username_sub: Link your Twitter account to gain more trust on the marketplace
setting.verification_description: Proceed with verification process to get more visibility and gain trust on Rarible Marketplace. Please allow up to several weeks for the process. Get verified Update profile
setting.choose_file_recommend: We recommend an image of at least 400x400. Gifs work too.

connect.connect_your_wallet_description: Connect with one of available wallet providers or create a new wallet.
connect.what_is_a_wallet_description: Wallets are used to send, receive, and store digital assets like Ether. Wallets come in many forms. They are either built into your browser, an extension added to your browser, a piece of hardware plugged into your computer, or even an app on your phone.
connect.note: We do not own your private keys and cannot access your funds without your confirmation.

create.guide: Choose ‚ÄúSingle‚Äù if you want your collectible to be one of a kind or ‚ÄúMultiple‚Äù if you want to sell one collectible multiple times
create.note: We do not own your private keys and cannot access your funds without your confirmation
create.put_on_market_sub: Enter price to allow users instantly purchase your NFT
create.price_placeholder2: Digital key, code to redeem or link a file...
create.unlock_once_purchased_description: Content will be unlocked after successful transaction
create.title: Title
create.description_placeholder: e.g. 'After purchasing you will be able to get the real T-Shirt
create.preview_upload: Upload file to preview your brand new NFT
create.short_url_bottom: Will be used as public URL

rari.description: We think that the best way to align platform development with customers' interests is to empower the ones who actively interact with protocol: creators and collectors Learn more about RARI token

who_is_eligible.heading: Who is eligible to participate in the airdrop?
who_is_eligible.first_desc: Active users will receive 2% of the total RARI supply according to the Liquidity Mining principle: based on the previous volume on Rarible marketplace. Both buyers and sellers will receive 50%.
who_is_eligible.second_desc: In this stage, 4% will be distributed amoung Ethereum addresses of all NFTs with documented sales on Dune Analytics.
who_is_eligible.third_desc: As we believe that Dune Analytics might not hold all the data, we introduced the third stage for corrections. If you haven‚Äôt found yourself on the list, but you know you have significant NFT holdings ‚Äî please reach out to us! The second airdrop wave will be announced later.

rari.how_get_RARI_desc: RARI is not an investment and should be earned by active participation on the platform. 75,000 tokens are issued every week, with 50% reserved for buyers, and 50% for sellers
